Cucumber-JVM 1.1.1 API

Main API Packages
cucumber.api  
cucumber.api.cli  
cucumber.api.groovy  
cucumber.api.guice There is no API for this module, but by including the cucumber-guice jar on your CLASSPATH your Step Definitions will be instantiated by Guice.
cucumber.api.java  
cucumber.api.jruby See the Ruby API for cucumber-jruby.
cucumber.api.junit  
cucumber.api.openejb There is no API for this module, but by including the cucumber-openejb jar on your CLASSPATH your Step Definitions will be instantiated by OpenEJB.
cucumber.api.picocontainer There is no API for this module, but by including the cucumber-picocontainer jar on your CLASSPATH your Step Definitions will be instantiated by PicoContainer.
cucumber.api.rhino See the Rhino JavaScript API for cucumber-rhino.
cucumber.api.scala See the Scala API for cucumber-scala.
cucumber.api.spring By including the cucumber-spring jar on your CLASSPATH your Step Definitions will be instantiated by Spring.
cucumber.api.weld There is no API for this module, but by including the cucumber-weld jar on your CLASSPATH your Step Definitions will be instantiated by Weld.
